response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it is indeed worth $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,800. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you can enjoy all the benefits this product has to offer without compromising on your budget. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that you will find this investment highly rewarding.", "product_price": 10800}
